          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Russianism</string>
            <string language="fi">Venäläisyys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Russianism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Russianism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Russianism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Russianism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Russianism</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Russianism</string>
          </title>
          <language>ru</language>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A connection exercise where the beginning of sentences on Russianism and the Russian lifestyle are connected to the most logical continuation.</string>
            <string language="fi">Yhdistelytehtävä, jossa yhdistetään venäläisyyttä ja venäläistä elämäntapaa käsittelevien lauseiden alku sille loogisimpaan jatkoon.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">Opetushallitus</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Anschlußübung, in der der Anfang von 
Programmsätzen auf Russianism und der russische Lebensstil an die 
logischste Fortsetzung angeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un exercice de connexion où le début des phrases 
sur Russianism et le style de vie russe sont reliés à la suite la 
plus logique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um exercício da conexão onde o começo das 
sentenças em Russianism e o lifestyle russian sejam conectados à 
continuação a mais lógica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esercitazione del collegamento dove l'inizio 
delle frasi su Russianism ed il lifestyle russo sono collegati alla 
continuazione più logica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια άσκηση σύνδεσης όπου η αρχή των προτάσεων σε 
Russianism και ο ρωσικός τρόπος ζωής συνδέονται με τη 
λογικότερη συνέχεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un ejercicio de la conexión donde el principio de 
sentencias en Russianism y la forma de vida rusa están conectados con
la continuación más lógica.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
